author: J. Munger
text:
I am looking to find examples of performance or outcome conditions within arena or convention center management contracts. My municipality has been subsidizing expenses and is aiming to hold the arena management accountable. 
The kind of outcomes we are looking to measure are: number of events at the facility, number of events with X% attendance, arena revenues versus municipal contributions.
title: Performance/Outcome Tracking for Public-Private Facilities
